website_summaries.verdict: Best used in a drill press, these counterbores work well with standard-sized screws and allen-head cap screws.
pros: 7-piece high-speed steel, solid capscrew counterbore set
cons: Pilots are not removable or interchangeable

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product, very poor shipping container...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is of good quality. The reason for the 4-star review is the shipping container. They were shipped in a much too large box without wrapping the high-speed steel counter-bores to prevent them from banging against each other during the shipping process. I was so disappointed when I received them knowing there would be damage to the flutes, but there was not damage to the flutes near the pilot, so they are useable, but still very unprofessional shipping practice. Other than that they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, bits are sharp and effective
customer_reviews.text: Works great, bits are sharp and effective. I used these on a cast iron cylinder head to do some modifications. Ideally, you want to use these in a drill press. I had to use the #8 counterbore bit in such a way that putting my workpiece in my drill press wasn't practical, so I used a hand drill and a steady hand, and it worked out great. I will say, the wood block for mine did not say "accusize", nor did the bits have accusize engraved on them, so it's possible I received a knockoff? Regardless, the quality was still good. I expect to use these again for more projects.
customer_reviews.author: Tad

customer_reviews.title: Hole in One
customer_reviews.text: Handy bits to have for cap screw installation, once you have them handy more and more cap screws seem to find their way into your projects.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to install Allen head cap screws. They worked perfectly and absolutely no issues, I used these on aluminum, as well as steel. So far they have held up very well and still sharp. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Tony H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: work awesome, remember low speeds on any counter bore tooling
customer_reviews.author: Duane B.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery (next day), packaged perfectly, sharp and cuts great! Tested on both 6160 aluminum and mild steel.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Moore

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a machinist and bought these for work he is very pleased with his purchase
customer_reviews.author: hope S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: They work well, good product for the money, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John Coupens

customer_reviews.title: worked very good only wish pilots were removable
customer_reviews.text: Have not used these for metal only for knife scales, worked very good only wish pilots were removable
customer_reviews.author: steven thompson

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get a 5/16 counterbore. The set came with an extra 1/4" counterbore, instead.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Still adding to my tooling
customer_reviews.text: Counter bores worked very well and a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: doug d.

customer_reviews.title: Wood holder
customer_reviews.text: No wood holder delivery like picture illustration is missing I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Accusize Industrial Tools H.S.S. Solid Cap Screw Counterbore Set, 3 Flute, Straight Shank, 7 Pc, 508S-0007
